file_content.text: The Grand Acquisitions Race begins. The Chevin Conglomerate seeks only the most skilled and capable sentients as its agents.
Rare and unique items are sought by the Conglomerate; curiosities of great value, but only to the Conglomerate itself. Where our procurers failed, your success shall be found.
Obtainment of these items will earn vast personal enrichment and aggrandizement. List provided.
Remember: serve the Chevin Conglomerate; serve your own self-growth and advantage.
